org.agilewiki.jfile.block

Class LBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jfile.block.LBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Block
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FBlock, LTBlock

    public class LBlock
extends Object
implements Block
    A block with a length in the header. --A minimal block implementation.
